mapper.insert: insert into t_info_slideshow_home ( slideshow_id, slideshow_num, image_path, start_time, end_time, goods_id, is_delete, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, version ) values ( #{slideshowId}, #{slideshowNum}, #{imagePath}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{goodsId}, #{isDelete}, now(), #{createUser}, now(), #{updateUser}, 0 )
